proofNotes: All 15 capability brief statements were successfully mapped to the RFP requirements.
ReliefRoster exceeds the volunteer capacity requirement by 150%.
Core functional requirements for registration, scheduling, and reporting are fully covered.
Proof verifier checks evidenceQuotes against the Capability Brief text (normalized matching; ellipsis wildcard supported).
The "Evidence mismatch" flag is verifier-owned and is only added/removed by the proof verifier.
Proof totals count unpaired evidence IDs (IDs without quotes) as unverified references (conservative scoring).

requirements.text: The system shall support volunteer registration with configurable form fields.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster provides a web-based registration system that allows for configurable form fields. It includes support for both required and optional field validation.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration with configurable form fields and required/optional validation.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to create events and define shifts with capacity limits.
requirements.responseSummary: Coordinators have the ability to manage events and specific shifts. Each shift can be configured with specific capacity limits to manage volunteer flow.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinators can create events and define shifts with capacity limits

requirements.text: The system shall allow volunteers to sign up for shifts and receive confirmations.
requirements.responseSummary: Volunteers can self-enroll in available shifts through the platform. The system automatically generates email confirmations upon successful signup.
evidenceQuotes: volunteers can self-signup for available shifts
Automated email confirmations and reminders are supported

requirements.text: The system shall send automated reminders 24 hours and 2 hours before a shift via email.
requirements.responseSummary: The platform supports automated email reminders with flexible scheduling. This includes the specific 24-hour and 2-hour intervals requested.
evidenceQuotes: reminders are supported with configurable schedules (e.g., 24h, 2h)

requirements.text: The system shall support optional SMS reminders (if enabled by the organization).
requirements.responseSummary: SMS reminders are available but are not a native default feature. Integration requires a third-party SMS provider account managed by the organization.
evidenceQuotes: SMS reminders are not included by default; integration is possible via a third-party SMS provider
gapsOrQuestions: Which third-party SMS providers are currently supported?
Are there additional integration fees from MatrixMint?

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to mark attendance and record no-shows.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster includes dedicated attendance tracking features. Coordinators can record attendance, add notes, and specifically flag no-shows.
evidenceQuotes: Attendance tracking is supported for each shift, including notes and no-show marking.

requirements.text: The system shall maintain a volunteer profile including languages, skills, certifications, and availability.
requirements.responseSummary: Comprehensive volunteer profiles are supported. These profiles track skills, language preferences, certifications, and availability notes.
evidenceQuotes: Volunteer profiles support skills, language preference, certifications, and availability notes.

requirements.text: The system shall support role-based access (Admin, Coordinator, Volunteer).
requirements.responseSummary: The platform utilizes role-based access control. It includes the specific roles of Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer as required.
evidenceQuotes: Role-based access is supported with Admin, Coordinator, and Volunteer roles.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a bilingual messaging option (English/Spanish) for templates.
requirements.responseSummary: Messaging templates can be created in both English and Spanish. Coordinators can select the appropriate language template for each communication.
evidenceQuotes: Messaging templates can be authored in English and Spanish; coordinators can choose the template language per send.

requirements.text: The system shall provide a dashboard showing: total registered volunteers, upcoming shifts and fill rates, attendance rate and no-show rate, volunteer hours by event.
requirements.responseSummary: The system includes a dashboard that tracks all requested metrics. This includes volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance percentages, and total hours.
evidenceQuotes: Dashboards include volunteer counts, fill rates, attendance rate, and volunteer hours by event.

requirements.text: The system shall support CSV export of volunteer rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster supports data portability via CSV export. This functionality covers rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported for rosters, schedules, and attendance logs.

requirements.text: The system shall allow coordinators to broadcast announcements to selected volunteer segments (by skill/language/location).
requirements.responseSummary: The system supports broadcasting to segments based on skill and language. However, location-based segmentation is not explicitly mentioned in the current capabilities.
evidenceQuotes: broadcast announcements to volunteer segments (by skill and language preference)
gapsOrQuestions: Can 'location' be added as a custom field for segmentation?
Is location-based filtering on the product roadmap?

requirements.text: The system shall provide a basic audit log of coordinator actions (event created, shift edited, message sent).
requirements.responseSummary: An audit log records key coordinator activities. This includes event creation, edits, and communication history.
evidenceQuotes: Coordinator actions are recorded in an audit log (event creation/editing and message sends).

requirements.text: The system shall support data retention settings (e.g., delete inactive volunteer records after X months).
requirements.responseSummary: The platform allows organizations to define their own data retention rules. This includes automated handling of inactive volunteer records.
evidenceQuotes: Data retention rules can be configured for inactive volunteers (organization chooses retention period).

requirements.text: The system shall provide accessibility considerations for web UI (keyboard navigation and readable contrast).
requirements.responseSummary: The UI supports keyboard navigation for essential workflows. However, specific documentation regarding readable contrast standards is currently missing.
evidenceQuotes: includes keyboard navigation for key workflows
gapsOrQuestions: Does the UI meet WCAG 2.1 AA contrast requirements?

requirements.text: The platform shall be accessible via modern browsers on desktop and mobile.
requirements.responseSummary: ReliefRoster is a web-based platform designed for modern browsers. It includes specific support for mobile browser access.
evidenceQuotes: ReliefRoster provides web-based volunteer registration
UI supports mobile browsers

requirements.text: The platform shall support at least 2,000 registered volunteers.
requirements.responseSummary: The standard deployment of ReliefRoster supports up to 5,000 registered volunteers, exceeding the requirement.
evidenceQuotes: designed for organizations up to ~5,000 volunteers on standard deployment.

requirements.text: The platform shall provide basic error handling and clear user guidance.
requirements.responseSummary: The capability brief does not explicitly detail error handling mechanisms or user guidance features.
gapsOrQuestions: Does the system provide inline validation errors?
Is there a help center or tooltips for user guidance?

requirements.text: The platform shall ensure that exported data can be downloaded without additional tools.
requirements.responseSummary: Data is exported in CSV format, which is a standard file type that does not require proprietary tools to open or download.
evidenceQuotes: CSV export is supported

proposalOutline.executiveSummary: MatrixMint Solutions proposes ReliefRoster to empower RapidRelief Network with a scalable, bilingual volunteer coordination platform. Our solution streamlines registration and scheduling while providing the robust reporting and audit logs necessary for nonprofit accountability.
evidenceVerificationNotes: All claims are mapped directly to CB-01 through CB-15.
SMS and location-based segmentation are flagged as partial to ensure transparency.
Capacity and browser compatibility are fully verified.
